list_definition.definition: a circular frame or disc turning on a rod or axle, on which vehicles etc move along the ground

list_definition.definition: any of several things similar in shape and action

list_definition.definition: to cause to move on wheels

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He wheeled his bicycle along the path.
He wheeled round and slapped me.
